attributes.action: Do not make face masks compulsory in English classrooms
attributes.additional_details: Please provide scientific evidence and a cost benefit analysis. We would like government to ensure us this won't be mandated and will be entirely optional.
attributes.background:
Please do not mandate the wearing of face coverings in secondary school classrooms across England. 
Allow students who wish to wear them to do so. Provide teachers with more protection. Wearing a face covering for 6 hours a day will be uncomfortable and may increase the risk of the virus spreading.

rejection.details:
You may like to sign this petition that we currently have open:

Do not make it mandatory to wear a mask in the classroom
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/576843
